alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 12:06PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. .Snowmelt river flooding to continue. Rate of rise and ultimate crest is uncertain due to rate of ongoing snowmelt runoff and possible rain and colder temperatures in the forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Pembina. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 46.6 feet, MN 175 bridge (south of Pembina and north of Drayton) approaches flood (MN DOT). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 28.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday and continue rising to 46.9 feet Monday. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
